ladies and gentlemen in light of a recent post, I decided to prove that the e-class can be killed in a single shot without having to use a battleship.

To do this I decided to use a ship your all familiar with. The Salvation Class Destroyer. The distance to target is 300 meters

The only modifications is to the weapons. The new missiles are simply scaled down versions of the Judgement Cannon seen on the Rapture Class Dreadnaught

Shot fired

and hit

the result. One dead e-class.

the test was repeated 5 times to insure it wasnt a lucky shot.

5 test

5 shots

5 kills (one time it killed the Kerbal)
no kerbal's were harmed in the making of this post...no really calm down everyone it was all a really bad dream... ok simulation...
